about_the_game:
◆ Game Overview


"Sucubus Heaven" is a roguelike 3D action game that challenges players to explore dungeons filled with miasma and curses. You lead a party of three characters, progressing through dungeon rooms one by one, managing your resources carefully to reach the deepest floor.

◆ Combat System


Players control one of three characters, each with distinct traits, engaging in real-time combat. The action system is simple, with basic "Normal Attacks," high-damage but resource-consuming "Special Attacks," and "Dodging" to evade enemy attacks.



Successfully timing a dodge results in a "Perfect Dodge" that can be followed up with a powerful "Perfect Dodge Counter."

◆ Unique Adult System


All enemies attack the heroines to sexually assault them. Physical attacks wear down their "Magic Clothes," while sexual attacks increase their arousal. When the arousal reaches its limit, it accumulates as "Corruption" on their bodies. The more "Corruption" builds up, the weaker the heroines become, eventually losing the ability to resist.



These events occur in real-time during battles, so even characters not being directly controlled are constantly at risk. Additionally, the dungeon is filled with lewd "Miasma," and the longer the battle lasts, the more the characters are affected by it. It is wise to finish fights quickly.

◆ Game Replay Benefits


Upon completing a playthrough, players receive a score based on their performance. Depending on the accumulated score, new "Loadouts" and "Boons (Blessings/Curses)" are unlocked. If the game feels too difficult, you can make it easier, or if too easy, add more challenging conditions.



The more challenging the conditions set, the easier it is to earn higher scores. Taking on difficult challenges might be the quickest route to mastering the game.

◆ Game Volume


  • Over 21 types of enemies with restraining erotic attacks.
  • 8 different game-over scenes.
  • 2–3 hours of playtime for a single playthrough. (if you manage to reach the game's end.)

❤ Linked with Adult Toys


This work can be linked with "many app-controllable adult toys."
For details on compatible adult toys and specific linking methods, please refer to the "Adult Toy Linkage Manual" in the online manual.

◆ Frequently Asked Questions


Q. Is there a mosaic on the genitalia?
A. The genitalia are censored with a mosaic. It cannot be removed with a patch, nor will it be removed in the future.

Q. Are there any differences from other platforms?
A. Aside from Steam-exclusive features like achievements and cloud saves, there are no differences.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains nude women and sexual content. Sexual content in this game includes sexual assault/non-consensual sex, fantasy pregnancy, obscene jewelry and body paint. All characters in this game are 18 years of age or older.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: intel Core i7-7700
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1660 SUPER
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A roguelite 3D action game for adults that challenges the lair of lewd demons with a desperate fighting force. Designed to pinch the heroine, the game offers a "normal play and lose" experience despite being an adult game.
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support
